synopsis.text: Soraâ€™s bond with his older sister, Aki, transcends typical sibling affection, a secret they keep hidden from their twin sister, Nami. As they navigate their complex relationship, Nami remains oblivious and sets her sights on matching her brother with her best friend, Kana. Meanwhile, Nami wrestles with her own secret feelings for someone close to her. The Aoi siblings' lives intertwine in a delicate dance of love, secrets, and unrequited affection, as they explore the boundaries between sibling love and romantic desire. Will their relationships strengthen or shatter their familial bond?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
